content: pick up one stitch for smaller hands skip picking up the extra stitch knit in round for 10 5 rounds thank you for knitting the k2tog until 6 5 stitches remain wildflower mittens and cowl gather these remaining stitches with tapestry needle and pull tight weave in ends and participating in this year s minnesota yarn shop hop add flower add daisy stitch around bobble option to skip the bottom petal and have five petals so stem isn t covered drawing from penguin & stitch
